title: Hitman Absolution Professional Edition - PROPHET [deepstatus]
description:
Hitman Absolution Professional Edition-PROPHET










Hitman Absolution is the fifth game in the Hitman: Codename 47 franchise which features the titular character "47".

Hitman: Absolution will be released onto Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC on November 20, 2012.

Hitman Absolution follows the events in Hitman: Blood Money, after Diana Burnwood assists 47 in escaping machinations from the Agency and other interested parties.

Absolution will follow 47 on a quest to repay Diana's prior efforts by locating a mysterious girl named Victoria; 47 will need to protect Vika from the depredations of the Agency and other interested parties.


The Professional Edition Hitman: Absolution - includes the 72-page Artbook and a Making of video.


Also all DLC content is included:

Hitman: Absolution: Agency Jagd P22G
Hitman: Absolution: Agency SPS 12
Hitman: Absolution: Agency HX UMP
Hitman: Absolution: Bartoli Custom Gun
Hitman: Absolution: Krugermeier 2-2 Gun
Hitman: Absolution: Bronson M1928 Gun
Hitman: Absolution: High Tech Disguise
Hitman: Absolution: High Roller Disguise
Hitman: Absolution: Public Enemy Disguise
Hitman: Absolution: Deus Ex (Adam Jensen) Disguise
Hitman: Absolution: Deus Ex (Adam Jensen) Handgun
